source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a vehicle driving down a wet city street at night. The street is illuminated by numerous colorful neon signs, whose lights reflect off the slick pavement. The camera moves forward at a steady pace, capturing the vibrant, nocturnal urban environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a vehicle driving down a wet city street at night. The street is illuminated by numerous colorful neon signs, whose lights reflect off the slick pavement. The camera moves forward at a steady pace, capturing the vibrant, nocturnal urban environment.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that pedestrians are crossing the street in front of the vehicle, as this is an important aspect of subject motion that should be included in the description.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a vehicle driving down a wet city street at night. The street is illuminated by numerous colorful neon signs, whose lights reflect off the slick pavement. Pedestrians are crossing the street in front of the vehicle, adding dynamic motion to the scene. The camera moves forward at a steady pace, capturing the vibrant, nocturnal urban environment.
